text: Karan Brar (born January 18, 1999) is a teenage American actor. He is known from his role as "Chirag Gupta" in the movie series Diary of a Wimpy Kid. He is also known for co-starring role as "Ravi Ross" on the Disney Channel Original Series Jessie and its spinoff series Bunk'd. == Acting == === Movies === Year Movie Character Notes 2010 Diary of a Wimpy Kid Chirag Gupta Main Character 2011 Rodrick Rules Chirag Gupta Main Character 2012 Dog Days [Diary of a Wimpy Kid 3] Chirag Gupta Main Character 2012 Chilly Christmas Caps 2014 Mr. Peabody & Sherman Mason Secondary Character 2015 Invisible Sister George Official Disney XD Movie === TV Shows === Year Show Character Notes 2011-2015 Jessie Ravi Ross Main Character 2012 Austin & Ally Ravi Ross Guest 2012 Pair of Kings Tito Guest 2013-2014 Pass the Plate Karan Brar 2013-Today Sofia the First Zender Returning Character 2013 Good Luck Charlie Ravi Ross Guest 2014 Spiderman Ravi Ross Guest 2014 Lab Rats Kal Zar Guest 2015-Today Bunk'd Ravi Ross Main Character 2016 The Night Shift Omed Guest == Achievements == Year Prize Category Job Result 2011 Youngest artist Prize - Young actors Diary of a Wimpy Kid 2012 Best Performance in a Feature Film - Young actors Diary of a Wimply Kid: Rodrick Rules Best Performance in a TV Series - Supporting Young Actor Jessie 2013 Best Performance in a Feature Film - Supporting Young Actor Diary of a Wimply Kid: Dog Days Best Performance in a Feature Film - Young Ensemble Cast Best act in a storylined TV Show - Young actors Jessie == References == Category:American television actors Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Washington (state) Category:American child actors Category:Comedians from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American voice actors
